name: endlessCorona
description:
The prophecies of Nostradamus, the 2000 effect, the Maya? They predicted the end of the world and “nothing” happened and now, without anyone predicting it, the end of the world has come!

Do we make a record? let's see who can last longer without getting infected ... Join the world competition!

The classic "endless runner" set in pandemic times. A fun third-person game where you have to jump, dodge and destroy the Covid-19 virus to survive as long as possible.


Characteristics

-The goal is to collect protective masks and hydroalcoholic gel to pass the screen while dodging the virus.

-There are four different screens that are repeated cyclically, where each time the speed of the character increases. It has no end and everything is getting faster and faster.

-The game starts by jumping and dodging and if you go through the necessary screens you will unlock a laser weapon and a vaccine that will help you fight the virus by destroying it.

-You can choose between three characters, plus a quarter of which you have to unlock by going through screens.

-You can see a local table with the five best personal scores and, if you get enough points you will go to the global table next to the best in the world (need internet).

-And remember, distance, hygiene and, prevention.
